name: Angel of Blue Tears
effectText: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; its controller's opponent takes damage equal to the number of cards in their hand x 200, then negate that target's effects until the end of this turn. If effect damage is inflicted (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY; Set 1 Normal Trap directly from your hand or Deck. If Set from the hand, it can be activated this turn. You can only use 1 "Angel of Blue Tears" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
